Translations.Text: Wa Tarahum Yu`rađuna `Alayha Khashi`ina Mina Adh-Dhulli Yanzuruna Min Tarfin Khafiyin Wa Qala Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Inna Al-Khasirina Al-Ladhina Khasiru 'Anfusahum Wa 'Ahlihim Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'Ala 'Inna Az-Zalimina Fi `Adhabin Muqimin
Wa Ma Kana Lahum Min 'Awliya'a Yansurunahum Min Duni Allahi Wa Man Yuđlili Allahu Fama Lahu Min Sabilin
Astajibu Lirabbikum Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiya Yawmun La Maradda Lahu Mina Allahi Ma Lakum Min Malja'iin Yawma'idhin Wa Ma Lakum Min Nakirin

Fa'in 'A`rađu Fama 'Arsalnaka `Alayhim Hafizaan 'In `Alayka 'Illa Al-Balaghu Wa 'Inna 'Idha 'Adhaqna Al-'Insana Minna Rahmatan Fariha Biha Wa 'In Tusibhum Sayyi'atun Bima Qaddamat 'Aydihim Fa'inna Al-'Insana Kafurun
Lillahi Mulku As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Yakhluqu Ma Yasha'u Yahabu Liman Yasha'u 'Inathaan Wa Yahabu Liman Yasha'u Adh-Dhukura
Aw Yuzawwijuhum Dhukranaan Wa 'Inathaan Wa Yaj`alu Man Yasha'u `Aqimaan 'Innahu `Alimun Qadirun
Wa Ma Kana Libasharin 'An Yukallimahu Allahu 'Illa Wahyaan 'Aw Min Wara'i Hijabin 'Aw Yursila Rasulaan Fayuhiya Bi'idhnihi Ma Yasha'u 'Innahu `Aliyun Hakimun
